document.full_text: carmelo anthony scored 39 points as the knicks ended a six-game losing streak, outlasting orlando, whose star, dwight howard, fouled out late in overtime.
document.title: knicks 113, magic 106 (ot): anthony's 39 and a foul call lift the knicks
lines_and_colors: carmelo anthony scored 39 points as the knicks ended a six-game losing streak, outlasting orlando, whose star, dwight howard, fouled out late in overtime.
